SEARCH
Module brickGame
Package CollisionLogic

Class collisionChecker

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
brickGame.Main
CollisionLogic.collisionChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEngine.OnAction, EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
public class collisionChecker extends Main
The `collisionChecker` class is responsible for checking and handling collisions of the ball with the walls, breaker, and blocks. It also manages the physics of the ball movement.
See Also:
